name: run_prediction
description: Stock prediction for a symbol (e.g. AAPL). Returns forecast and model_id. May require x402 payment (402 → pay via facilitator → retry with PAYMENT-SIGNATURE).

name: run_backtest
description: Backtest a trading strategy for a symbol. Returns total_return, sharpe_ratio, max_drawdown, win_rate, n_trades, equity_curve, trades. May require x402 payment.

name: open_bank_account
description: Start CornerStone bank link flow to open/link a bank account. May require x402 payment (Base/EVM).

name: get_borrower_score
description: Get CornerStone borrower score for an agent wallet. Query param wallet=0x... May require x402 payment.

name: get_agent_reputation_score
description: Get agent reputation score for a wallet. Query param wallet=0x... May require x402 payment.

name: get_agent_reputation_score_by_email
description: Get agent reputation score by email (resolves from onboarding submissions). Higher price (base + extra). Requires SCORE_BY_EMAIL_ENABLED. May require x402 payment.

email.description: Email address (must exist in onboarding submissions)

name: get_borrower_score_by_email
description: Get CornerStone borrower score by email (resolves from onboarding submissions). Higher price (base + extra). Requires SCORE_BY_EMAIL_ENABLED. May require x402 payment.
